item.title: Neglecting Every Job To Move Progress Forward!
item.description: Sometimes you’ve got to drop everything else just to keep the big project moving. Watch as we push aside smaller jobs to finally make some real progress in the field!

media:content.media:title: Neglecting Every Job To Move Progress Forward!
media:content.media:description: Sometimes you’ve got to drop everything else just to keep the big project moving. Watch as we push aside smaller jobs to finally make some real progress in the field!

item.title: About Time We Clean These!!
item.description: It’s about time we tackled this mess—watch us clean and get everything back in order!

item.title: We Bought A Semi (IT TOOK 4 CHECKBOOKS)
item.description: The big day finally came—we bought a semi! But it wasn’t easy… it took four checkbooks to seal the deal. Watch the story behind this major purchase and what’s next for the rig.

item.title: 18 Years Old With 600 Hours!?! We Couldn’t Help Ourselves!
item.description: We stumbled across an 18-year-old machine with only 600 hours on it—too good to pass up! Here’s what we found and why we just had to bring it home.

item.title: Don’t Buy A Truck From A Junk Yard!
item.description: I share my experience with buying a truck from a junkyard and why it ended up costing more than expected.

item.title: Load Scrap Iron But Dougo Found a Way to Get Another Thing Stuck!!
item.description: We set out to haul scrap iron, but Dougo managed to find yet another way to get something stuck! Watch the chaos unfold in the yard.

item.title: How Many Flat Tires Will We Get At The Scrap Yard!?
item.description: I’m taking on a day at the scrap yard—how many flat tires will we run into while moving all this metal?

item.title: The Replacement!!
item.description: The Replacement!!

item.title: Fixing Last Years Fertilizer Problems! We Were Way Off!
item.description: I revisit our farm fields to fix last year’s fertilizer issues, sharing how we adjust and improve for a healthier, more productive crop

item.title: Bring The Quad Track!! 2 Stucks In One Field!
item.description: We’ve got two stuck vehicles in one field—see how bringing the quad track helps us get both out safely!

item.title: We Know What We're Doing!
item.description: We Know What We're Doing!

item.title: We Found The Weak Point!!
item.description: While pushing our equipment to the limit, we finally discovered the hidden weak point that’s been holding us back. Watch as we break it down, show exactly what failed, and share how we plan to fix it for good!

item.title: Blessed With A Lemon!! Broke Again.
item.description: Let's see if it works now

item.title: The New Electric Tractor Is Here!!
item.description: We just got our hands on the latest electric tractor! Come along as we test its power, performance, and what it means for the future of farming.

item.title: Neglecting Every Job To Move Progress Forward!
item.description: I focus on moving the farm work forward, even if it means putting other tasks on hold to get the job done efficiently.

item.title: But If I Would Have Made It!!
item.description: A near miss that could’ve changed everything—watch what almost happened and why it would’ve been epic.

item.title: 18 Years Old With 600 Hours!?! We Couldn’t Help Ourselves!
item.description: 18 Years Old With 600 Hours!?! We Couldn’t Help Ourselves!

item.title: The Year That Keeps On Giving!
item.description: From surprises to challenges, this year just won’t quit — and we’re making the most of every twist it throws our way.

item.title: Load Scrap Iron But Dougo Found a Way to Get Another Thing Stuck!!
item.description: I’m loading scrap iron when Dougo somehow gets stuck again—watch the unexpected twist on the farm today!

item.title: It Sheared Right Off!!!!
item.description: there's always problems like this in the farm!
